pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perseus R Interop // Enables the interoperability between the Perseus platform for omics data analysis (Tyanova et al. 2016) doi:10.1038/nmeth.3901 and R. It provides the foundation for developing and running Perseus plugins implemented in R by providing all required input and output handling, including data and parameter parsing as described in Rudolph and Cox 2018 doi:10.1101/447268.
